item.description:
How to find us: We will be in the back close to the dance floor, having dinner, I look like my picture as well.

cancel

Come on out to the Ashworth they have a great DJ, huge dance floor and excellant food, they do seperate checks as well. So come out and bring lots of smiles, as we love to give lots of huggys as well!!!!

 

I can be reached at 978-857-6626

item.name: Last Minute Dinner/Dancing at the Ashworth /Hampton Beach
